amendment.description: To prioritize scarce resources to basic medical services for Indians.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4036 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 21 - 73. Record Vote Number: 26.

action.text: Amendment SA 4036 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S996-1004, S1027-1028) To prioritize scarce resources to basic medical services for Indians.
